ChunkText: a great option if your immigration history is complicated, unless travelling and visa applications are difficult, such as for iranian students.
ContextBefore: consular processing: application is only if you and your position qualify under the h-1b rules. does not consider if you followed all rules while in the us. change does not actually take place until you leave the US and get the h-1b visa, so need to have optstem OPT until that time to continue working.
